text: (Aey Nabi), kehdo ke agar tumhare baap aur tumhare bete, aur tumhare bhai, aur tumhari biwiyan aur tumhare aziz-o-aqareb (near and dear ones) aur tumhare woh maal jo tumne kamaye hain, aur tumhare woh karobar (business) jinke maandh (decline) padh janey ka tumko khauf hai aur tumhare woh ghar jo tumko pasand hain, tumko Allah aur uske Rasool aur uski raah mein jihad se azeez-tar hain to intezar karo yahan tak ke Allah apna faisla tumhare saamne le aaye, aur Allah faasiq logon ki rehnumayi nahin kiya karta
